projects.title: M.Tech. Project : Impact of corporate governance and board composition on financial performance of firms - Empirical evidence from India
B.Tech. Project : Correlation Analysis of US Recessions and Indian Stock Markets with Sunspot Activity
Naive Bayes prediction on CMC dataset
projects.description: - Created a model based on Naive Bayes theorem to predict contraceptive choice according to demographics on CMC dataset- Implemented Naive Bayes classifier and achieved 72% accuracy with K-fold cross validation- Developed a probabilistic classifier from scratch without using any standard libraries- Identified grouping and segregation in the classification output using summary statistics for understanding demographic effects

projects.title: Prediction of high temperature flow behaviour of Ti alloys as a function of chemical composition and microstructure employing feed-forward artificial neural network
projects.description: - Extensive data mining related to high temperature flow behaviour of different titanium alloys in wide ranges ofstrain, strain rate and temperature- MATLAB and PYTHON modelling of artificial neural network model and various hyperparameter tuning- Development of a robust feed forward ANN model employing back propagation with bayesian regularisation thatefficiently predicts the high temperature flow stress of Ti alloys as a function of chemical composition, microstructureand various processing parameters (temperature, stain, strain rate)- Assessment of predictability of ANN model employing various statistical parameters like (Root mean square error,Scatter index, Adjusted R square)- Assessed the relative importance of various input variables using Multiple linear regression and Most squaresalgorithm- The developed model has the capability to design new Ti alloys to achieve required high temperature flow behaviour
